name: Sony WH-1000XM5
description: Noise cancelling wireless headphones, 30 hour battery life, black, over-ear. Great for travel.

name: Logitech MX Master 3S
description: Ergonomic wireless performance mouse, quiet clicks, 8K DPI, graphite color. Best for coding.

name: Keychron K2 Mechanical Keyboard
description: 75% layout, wireless mechanical keyboard, RGB backlight, aluminum frame, Gateron Brown switches.

name: Herman Miller Aeron
description: Ergonomic office chair, graphite mesh, adjustable lumbar support, size B. High end office furniture.

name: JBL Tune 510BT
description: Budget wireless on-ear headphones, pure bass sound, 40H battery, quick charge. Good for students.

name: Audio-Technica ATH-M50x
description: Professional studio monitor headphones, wired, closed-back, high clarity. Best for mixing and editing.

name: Apple AirPods Max
description: Premium over-ear noise cancelling headphones, computational audio, aluminum cups, spatial audio.

name: Sennheiser HD 450BT
description: Mid-range wireless noise cancelling headphones, active noise cancellation, 30H battery life.

name: Bose QuietComfort 45
description: Iconic noise cancelling headphones, lightweight comfort, aware mode, high-fidelity audio.
